short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fact-check, article search, and dive deeper into the media presented before you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to RabbitHole, a Google Chrome Extension that allows users the capability to combat media misinformation in as simple as 2 clicks. Fact check information using the verified Google Fact Check API, or dig deeper into the RabbitHole of information provided by web scraping technology.

Simply open the Google Sidebar to the RabbitHole tab, then right click your highlighted text and enter the RabbitHole!
